basics.name: Hailey Fagaragan
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am an aspiring UX/UI Researcher & Designer studying for a B.A. in Information & Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa

courses: ICS 111: Introduction to Computer Science I
ICS 141: Disctrete Mathematics for Computer Science I
ICS 211: Introduction to Computer Science II
ICS 241: Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science II

highlights: Designed the user interface for an online education platform for children focusing on sexual education.
Conduct user research to understand the needs and preferences of the target audience.
Develop wireframes, prototypes, and design specifications.
Certified tutor for the Advancememt Via Individual Determination (AVID) program for the middle and high school level.
Monitered students' learning in various subjects, including core subjects.
Assisted in the college application process at the high school level.
